PhptravelsDemoPage.description: This is the demo page for PHPTravels, showcasing their travel booking software and allowing users to request an instant demo.

elements.name: First Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's first name.

elements.name: Last Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's last name.

elements.name: Business Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's business name.

elements.name: WhatsApp Number Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's WhatsApp number.

elements.name: Country Select
elements.description: Dropdown for selecting the user's country.

elements.name: "Get Started" Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the registration page.

elements.name: "Login" Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the login page.

assertions: Form with label 'Request Instant Demo' is visible
